Eytan Ruppin
dcterms:description: The WS-353 dataset consists of 353 pairs of words along with an averaged similarity score on a scale of 1.0 to 10.0 obtained from 13a16 human judges. Word pairs are presented as-is, without any context.
dcterms:title: WS-353

dcterms:creator: Peter D. Turney
dcterms:description: The ESL dataset consists of 50 target words that appear with 4 candidate lexical substitutes. While disambiguating context is also given in this dataset, it is discarded in the experiments.
dcterms:title: ESL

dcterms:creator: Iris Hendrickx
Su Nam Kim

Preslav Nakov
Diarmuid A SAaghdha
Sebastian PadA3
Marco Pennacchiotti
Lorenza Romano
Stan Szpakowicz
dcterms:description: The SemEval-2012 task 2 dataset characterizes a number of very distinct and interesting semantic relations, consisting of an aggregated set of 3464 word pairs evidencing 10 kinds of semantic relations.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2012 task 2
